document_data.caption: 'A map of the [[Easting Reach]] showing the location of Cairnpur.
document_data.name: Cairnpur
document_data.georefs: {{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dragon/346/Impiltur: The Forgotten Kingdom|62}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Cairnpur''' was a village located in [[Impiltur]] in the [[Northeast Faerûn]], off the coast of the [[Easting Reach]].
document_data.Geography: Cairnpur was known as one of several overnight stops for caravans that traveled along the [[Merchant's Run]], part of the [[Herald's Road]] that stretched between Impiltur and the [[Cold Lands]]. Cairnpur was the first caravan stop northwest of Ilmwatch, west of [[Even's Gulf]], the northernmost part of the Easting Reach. [[Maracrath]] was a caravan stop village to the northwest of Cairnpur.
document_data.Defenses: Cairnpur received protection from Ilmwatch's garrison contingents that traveled with merchant caravans between the Cold Lands and the Easting Reach.
